# Water's Blessing (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S, M (a fish scale)

**Range:** Close (25 feet + 5 feet/two levels)

**Target:** One creature/level

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 80

This spell adds a +5 bonus to creatures’ Swim checks. Clerics of 5th level and higher can choose that benefit or instead may add +10 feet to the affected creatures’ speed while swimming.
